title: New: Chrome Sparks – Still Sleeping (Feat. Steffaloo)
body: This new track comes courtesy of CitR favourites glitch-pop artist **Chrome Sparks** and elegant songstress **Steffaloo**. _Still Sleeping_ is an 8-bit influenced affair, using the delightful sampled vocals of **Steffaloo** to compliment the jagged, electro-pop beat. _Still Sleeping_ is available on a pay what you like basis, via the [**Chrome Sparks**](http://chromesparks.bandcamp.com/track/still-sleeping-feat-steffaloo) bandcamp; the wonderfully psychedelic artwork comes courtesy of **Jheri Evans** (**Crash Symbols** & **Get Off The Coast**). Check it out below. Still Sleeping (Feat. Steffaloo) by Chrome Sparks
